meta.content: The Southampton Township School District shall empower our students with the life skills necessary to attain academic excellence while fostering social and emotional growth.

header.h2: Important Info - New Instruction Starting April 20th!

div.p: Click "Read More" to access parent letters by school that outline new instruction beginning on April 20th!

div.div:
Welcome to the Southampton Schools website!
The Southampton Township School District shall empower our students with the life skills necessary to attain academic excellence while fostering social and emotional growth.
For more information about our 2019-20 district calendar please visit here.

h3.a: Important Info - New Instruction Starting April 20th!

div.div: Click "Read More" to access parent letters by school that outline new instruction beginning on April 20th!

Dear Parents/Guardians: We hope you and your family are all healthy and well. Due to COVID-19, we are unable to safely distribute your Pura Vida bracelet order at this time. We will make sure everyone receives their order as soon as we are able to safely get them to you.
Your School Counselors, Sarah Kilpatrick, Danielle Madison, Allison Shaughnessy

article.aria-label: School Closed - Professional Development for Staff

h3.a: School Closed - Professional Development for Staff

div.div: Location: School #1 playground / blacktop, weather permitting; School #3 Warriordome in the case of inclement weather.
The Southampton Township School District shall empower our students with the life skills necessary to attain academic excellence while fostering social and emotional growth.

By aligning our academic programs with the New Jersey Student Learning Standards, advocating a safe secure environment, our students will become life-long learners and responsible, caring, contributing community members both locally and globally.
It is the expectation of this school district that all students achieve the New Jersey Student Learning Standards at all grade levels.
Through collaboration with parents, faculty, staff, administration, Board of Education and community members, our goal is to make the students the priority as we build a tradition of excellence.
